alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:05PM EDT until June 15 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HOUSTON...NORTHERN JACKSON...NORTHERN WALTON... HOLMES AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 405 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Cottonwood to 10 miles northwest of De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Chipley, Graceville, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Marianna, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Madrid, Westville, Campbellton and Noma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
